text: Goodrichthys is an extinct genus of sharks from the Carboniferous. It is from the Glencartholm Volcanic Beds Formation (Upper Border Group) of Scotland. == References == # Ginter, Michal (May 2009). "The dentition of Goodrichthys, a Carboniferous ctenacanthiform shark from Scotland". Acta Zoologica. 90: 152â€“158. doi:10.1111/j.1463-6395.2008.00339.x. Category:Extinct fish Category:Sharks
title: Goodrichthys
